name: InterPals Soft – Complete redesign
description:
ADDITION: If you want to make default flags and icons into new and shiny, make sure to install my userscript :) (you'll also need Tampermonkey extension) This is a brand new looking design theme for the most popular pen pals searching social network InterPals. Removes the excess, beautifies the existing and pleases your eyes. New logo, new icons, new font, new colours and pleasure for perfectionists.
The author's profile: interpals.net/vplameniraket
If you like the style, please rate it & recommend it to your InterPals friends so that they could enjoy this style too!
